Name: TC-01
Folder: /Registered user exists with username testuser and valid password.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
1. Navigate to DemoBlaze login page. 2. Enter valid username and password. 
3. Click Log in.

Name: TC-02
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
1. Navigate to login page. 2. Enter valid username and an incorrect 
password. 3. Click Log in.

Name: TC-03
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: 1. Open product page. 2. Click Add to cart five times.

Name: TC-04
Folder: /At least one item is in the cart.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
1. Click Cart ? Place Order. 2. Enter valid shipping info and an invalid 
card number (e.g., 1111-1111-1111-1111). 3. Click Purchase.
